summary: Salicylic acid is a natural compound found in willow trees. It's a white, bitter-tasting solid and is related to aspirin. This acid is important in plants and can affect their growth. It's also used in some acne products because it helps remove dead skin cells. Salicylic acid can be harmful to developing babies, so it's listed as a potentially dangerous substance by the EPA. The name comes from the Latin word for willow.
title: Salicylic acid
